To the chief Musician<S>5329</S> on Neginoth<S>5058</S>, Maschil<S>4905</S>, A Psalm of David<S>1732</S>, when the Ziphims<S>2130</S> came<S>935</S> and said<S>559</S> to Saul<S>7586</S>, Doth not David<S>1732</S> hide<S>5641</S> himself with us? Save<S>3467</S> me, O God<S>430</S>, by thy name<S>8034</S>, and judge<S>1777</S> me by thy strength<S>1369</S>.
Hear<S>8085</S> my prayer<S>8605</S>, O God<S>430</S>; give ear<S>238</S> to the words<S>561</S> of my mouth<S>6310</S>.
For strangers<S>2114</S> are risen up<S>6965</S> against me, and oppressors<S>6184</S> seek<S>1245</S> after my soul<S>5315</S>: they have not set<S>7760</S> God<S>430</S> before them. Selah<S>5542</S>.
Behold, God<S>430</S> is mine helper<S>5826</S>: the Lord<S>136</S> is with them that uphold<S>5564</S> my soul<S>5315</S>.
He shall reward<S>7725</S> <S>7725</S> evil<S>7451</S> unto mine enemies<S>8324</S>: cut them off<S>6789</S> in thy truth<S>571</S>. <sup>mine: Heb. those that observe me</sup>
I will freely<S>5071</S> sacrifice<S>2076</S> unto thee: I will praise<S>3034</S> thy name<S>8034</S>, O LORD<S>3068</S>; for it is good<S>2896</S>.
For he hath delivered<S>5337</S> me out of all trouble<S>6869</S>: and mine eye<S>5869</S> hath seen<S>7200</S> his desire upon mine enemies<S>341</S>.
